title: Art Lead for Psychological Horror Game

hiringOrganization.name: Dark Nyx Studio
hiringOrganization.description: An indie game development team working on 'Jizo no Akumu', a psychological horror game inspired by Japanese folklore, focusing on trauma, memory, and identity.

description: Dark Nyx Studio is seeking an Art Lead for our upcoming game 'Jizo no Akumu'. The role involves overseeing the art aspects of the game, creating emotional and atmospheric visuals. Position is revshare only until the game releases commercially.
responsibilities: Lead the art team in creating visuals for the game
Collaborate closely with programmers and designers
Oversee the art development and ensure high-quality deliverables
qualifications: Experience in Unreal Engine is a plus
Ability to work collaboratively in a remote team environment
Excellent communication skills, especially via Discord

value.unitText: Percentage of profits after game release
